name: Helicopter Simulator Game Free 2016 - Pilot Career Missions
name_original: Helicopter Simulator Game Free 2016 - Pilot Career Missions
description:
Are you ready for the best flight simulator for helicopters that there is? Fly through more then 3000 missions using the top military and civilian aircrafts! Use your flying skills to complete the 6 categories of challenges: Career mode, Military, Coast Guard, Television Broadcast, Transport and Rescue and Tour flights through the city.

Rescue people in danger situations, transport important cargos, help the police during chases, and also to fly your helicopter close to a hurricane to broadcast it live! We guarantee hours of a amazing flight simulation experience!

MAIN FEATURES:
- 28 chopters
- 5 different weather forecasts, including day and night flights
- Real life scenario, with ground and air traffic
- 3.240 missions
- Career
- Militar
- Coast Guard
- Television Broadcast
- Transport
- Tour

This helicopter simulation also includes Time and Season features, so, you can choose day or night and different weather conditions!

- OTHER CHALLENGES:
- Chopter simulator for army situations, like escort armed trucks and soldiers
- Extinguish Fire
- Rescue people
- Time attack
- Fly the aircraft between skyscrapers, bridges
- Give a ride for some parachuters
- Help the police in car chases
- Transport weapons, VIP passengers and cargo.
- Shoot at moving targets with military helicopters
- ... and more!

Please, feel free to contact us to give your feedback about Helicopter Game Simulator Free!

*All logos, airlines, companies and people are fictional in the game.
Pilot, have a nice flight!
